mapper.select: select g.group_id, g.group_name, z.member_count from mug_group g left join (select m.group_id, count(1) member_count from mug_group_member m group by m.group_id) z on g.group_id = z.group_id

select m.pk_id, m.group_id, m.person_id, p.person_name, p.person_region, m.join_date, m.leave_date, m.remark from mug_group_member m left join mug_person p on m.person_id = p.person_id where m.group_id = #{groupId}
